title: Mastering Merge Sort in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the Merge Sort algorithm in JavaScript. Merge Sort is a popular divide-and-conquer sorting algorithm that is efficient and commonly used in practice. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how Merge Sort works and how to implement it in your own JavaScript projects.

meta.title: Mastering Merge Sort in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn the efficient Merge Sort algorithm and how to implement it in JavaScript. Dive into a comprehensive coding tutorial.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, coding tutorial, javascript practice online, sorting algorithm, javascript lab, merge sort, javascript tutor, programming
